title: A frendly farewel which Master Doctor Ridley, late Bishop of London did write beinge prisoner in Oxeforde, vnto all his true louers and frendes in God, a litle before that he suffred for the testimony of the truthe of Christ his Gospell. Newly setforth and allowed according to the order apoynted in the Quenes Maiesties iniunctions.
author: Ridley, Nicholas, 1500?-1555.
publisher: By Ihon Day, dwelling ouer Aldersgate, beneath. S. Martius [sic],
